It helps when they use a direct response or say your name. Its part of why =
I prefer to use water method for my recordings, then there is no deciding w=
hat is what. I suggest you start out recording short sessions. I usually re=
cord sweep for about 3 minutes at most. With water its always about 30 seco=
nds of recording time and that recording can contain 1-30 messages on -74 s=
peed. The speech is usually very very fast, different vibration than we hav=
e and with water the speech is way outside normal human speech rates.
=A0
A=
ttaching a recent h2o clip it should come as attachment to those getting in=
dividual emails. I dunno if you will hear this so I chose a short one of so=
meone saying "I spoke" to give you some idea of what I mean. This is in the=
 -74 speed range (slowed in audacity). Good luck!
=A0
Misty

--- On Thu, 5/=

How does on=
e tell which is only radio stations going by and spirit chat?=A0 The channe=
ls go by so quickly that it's hard to tell, even now on AM, I won't know wh=
at to cut, maybe just try loading on a short tapping, but I got to learn ho=
w to slow it down I guess.=A0 Sounds like people having a party in the back=
 room, I had to turn it off.=A0 I opened the door, and it was quiet, when i=
 walked in it was like hundreds of voices!=A0 But, this could only be radio=
 channels, even the AM was just buzzing away with them, the quietest was Sh=
ort wave, very few words, then there were a lot of Spanish people, don't kn=
ow what they were talking about, was a mess!
